titleStmt.title: An exact table, shewing the last day of the legal registration of inhib. interd. horn. relax. for all time, altering only in the leap year
titleStmt.author: Monteith, Robert, M.A.

titleStmt.title: An exact table, shewing the last day of the legal registration of inhib. interd. horn. relax. for all time, altering only in the leap year
titleStmt.author: Monteith, Robert, M.A.

notesStmt.note: At foot: "To the right worshipful Mr. John Mitchelson of Midletoun advocat, clerk to the Gerneral Register of Inhibitions, &c. This table is humbly dedicate by R. Montieth, M. A."
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
